open.title: FrogFoot outage | Port Shepstone
open.description: FrogFoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Port Shepstone, affected clients will experience no connectivity. FrogFoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.
